   artery disease status post bypass, atrial fibrillation, chronic renal

   home with altered mental status, intubated in the ED for airway
   protection.

   bleed or other acute pathology. No new medications to account for
   change in mental status.

   of renal failure, CK's flat.

   - Appreciate Neuro c/s

   reattempt today, unlikely bacterial meningitis, concern for
   carcinomatous meningitis given malignancy

   concerns about his mental status.

   - Holding beta-blocker given episode of bradycardia.
